We hope for a prompt resolution and peace in the region.

@BrianRAlexander EL AL has blocked the use of the Mir credit card as of 2/28. EL AL is operating flights to Russia at the request of the Israeli government to provide means of travel for Israelis & Jews from Russia for as long as possible. We hope for a prompt resolution and peace in the region.

data.text: @jdmyron Hello, thank you for reaching out. As we are still operating in a limited capacity, wait times for refunds are longer than usual. If you'd like to speak with a representative about your refund, please email your booking information to socialmedia@elal.com.

@ronni_mckay Hello, thank you for reaching out. As we are still operating in a limited capacity, wait times for refunds are longer than usual. If you'd like to speak with a representative about your refund, please email your booking information to socialmedia@elal.com.

@sarahmensch Hello, thank you for reaching out. We'd be happy to assist you further via email. Please send the full name on your reservation and booking code to socialmedia@elal.com and a representative will respond as soon as possible.

@callmerasul @USDOT @myflightrights @Expedia Hello, thank you for reaching out. We'd be happy to assist you further via email. Please send the full name on your reservation and booking code to socialmedia@elal.com and a representative will respond as soon as possible.

data.text: EL AL has canceled all scheduled flights until 5/30/20 in light of the strict guidelines from @IsraelMOH that remain in place and the extremely low demand for passenger flights. Read more here: https://t.co/ORY00S9QeF https://t.co/ID6tPKfiRe

EL AL Cargo has transported a full planeload of necessary medical equipment to Santo Domingo in the Dominican Republic. The EL AL Dreamliner landed in Santo Domingo yesterday & the aircraft will return to Israel with 40 tons of fresh pineapples. More here: https://t.co/B7Jlh6GpsX https://t.co/hosBMK50Om

EL AL Israel Airlines will operate 60 cargo flights from Wuhan, China via Israel to London, Paris, and Frankfurt with humanitarian equipment required in the efforts to deal with COVID-19. Click here to read more: https://t.co/F9AhMQHuui https://t.co/aI9suP697e

data.text: During the current COVID-19 crisis, EL AL continues to operate cargo shipments from anywhere in the world, in addition to organizing and operating rescue missions. Read more here: https://t.co/tQ6cgEVVk4 https://t.co/5ikDsErzPV

Recently, the EL AL Cargo Division signed a deal with global logistics giant @Kuehne_Nagel to operate 150 flights from China to Italy via Israel with cargo to aid in the COVID-19 crisis. Read more about our partnership here: https://t.co/m0PelM2pgk https://t.co/tzE1k9wRfz

data.text: EL AL recently transported 3.5 million face masks, 75,000 face shields, and 2,000 pulse oximeters from China to healthcare workers in Detroit, Michigan. Thank you to our wonderful crew for yet another successful flight! #ELALUpward https://t.co/Xt2DRU3BdE

As the COVID-19 crisis continues, we remain grateful to all healthcare professionals as well as our employees, who are steadfast in their work to bring Israelis home & transport PPE to medical professionals in need. From all of us at EL AL, Shabbat Shalom. Stay home. Stay safe. https://t.co/LGVZANe680

data.text: @cheskymeyer Due to the current situation, we are operating in an extremely limited capacity, which means we are not able to assist customers in a normal capacity. If you would like to contact a representative, please fill out this form on our website: https://t.co/SadHw7b5n9

@AlinMerit @AirPassRightsCA During this challenging time, we are operating in an extremely limited capacity. Due to this, we will be assisting all customers once we return to regular operations. If you'd like to contact us, please visit our website: https://t.co/u82OeorRnO
@JustCoupleComp1 At this time we are operating in an extremely limited capacity. To get in contact with a representative, please visit our website: https://t.co/tHLCgN8Pux

EL AL recently embarked on a mission to bring home to the USA more than 2,000 high school and college students who were studying in Israel. Watch the video below to hear more about this extraordinary trip: https://t.co/M6Vy9GvAxr

data.text:
All of us at EL AL, including flight attendants, pilots, technicians, and management, wish and hope to return to regular operations soon. Read more here: https://t.co/XKiXre92yH 

Happy Passover! https://t.co/On0prUCsz3

As this Passover is different from every other year, we’d like to share just a few of the many virtual Seders being offered online. Click here to read more: https://t.co/Z46OxZyt7Z https://t.co/827Nrpu5ao

Earlier today, the first plane from a series of flights from China landed at Ben-Gurion Airport transporting 20 tons of essential PPE for medical professionals in Israel. Click here to read more: https://t.co/3IWf1uhnQd https://t.co/zIFRVLBDK7

As another challenging week comes to an end, we want to express gratitude once again to our customers, employees, & all essential employees. We continue to be inspired by the dedication and sacrifice from all essential employees. On behalf of all of us at EL AL, Shabbat Shalom. https://t.co/VT2l4gz9vR

Welcome home! EL AL flight LY086 non-stop from Melbourne, Australia has landed in Israel. Thank you to our wonderful crew and passengers for a successful trip! 🇮🇱

📸: Sivan Farag https://t.co/B5TLEmgImQ

After the longest flight in Israel's aviation history, we are preparing to fly back home to Israel. Thank you to our flight crew for making this rescue flight to Melbourne, Australia a success. 🇮🇱✈️🇦🇺

📸: Oz Lev and @aus_jewishnews https://t.co/4StevMxlZi

Welcome to Melbourne, Australia! EL AL has landed after a 17-hour nonstop flight from Israel to bring more Israelis home. 🇮🇱🇦🇺

Video: Daniel Weil https://t.co/mT7piq2mN6
📸: Oz Lev

Following the request from Foreign Minister Israel Katz from @IsraelMFA, EL AL is operating an unprecedented rescue operation with non-stop flights from Melbourne, Australia, to return Israelis home. Thank you to our flight crews for making this historic trip possible! 🇮🇱✈️🇦🇺 https://t.co/NeYhkEKQP4

To all of our customers, we appreciate your patience during this challenging time. For the time being, our call center will not be operating. You can reach us via the EL AL website through the "Contact us" option: https://t.co/pJlzXJfsEE. https://t.co/9d5mUortpf

We want to express our gratitude to all EL AL customers for your patience, understanding, & loyalty during these challenging days. We are grateful to all EL AL employees who have worked so hard to ensure your safety & comfort. Read more here: https://t.co/y11EJ7IsNO https://t.co/JtlFnNC9Kj

Following an assessment of the current and expected situation, EL AL has decided to temporarily suspend its flights departing Israel from midnight on March 27th to April 4th, 2020. For more information, click here: https://t.co/yH6IB5Chkh https://t.co/HYnpWzNgla

data.text: EL AL has landed in Australia with its first direct flight from Israel! 🇮🇱🇦🇺 https://t.co/sL7fvgX4tt
@Mpritzke Hi Marcie, we recommend contacting your credit card company to verify if a refund is being processed. If not, please give us another call at 1 (800) 223-6700.
@DennySerife Hi Denise, please contact a customer service representative for more assistance: 1 (800) 223-6700.

@bmoskowitz We apologize for the dropped call and appreciate your patience! We have added extra personnel to our phone lines to accommodate the existing demand. Give us another call and a customer service representative will connect with you as soon as possible.

@bmoskowitz Thank you for reaching out. We will gladly freeze your ticket for you. Please give us a call at 1 (800) 223-6700 for more assistance. We appreciate your patience during this difficult time.

EL AL is continuing to bring Israelis from around the world home. Later this week, EL AL will operate special rescue flights to India, Australia, Brazil, and Costa Rica to bring more Israelis home.

To book a ticket, please call our dedicated hotline: +97239771123. https://t.co/7YkyPIQl5P
@MrMikeLevitt Hi Michael, please call a customer service representative for assistance on this matter: 1 (800) 223-6700. We appreciate your patience during this time.
@FrankMattingl11 Hi Frank, please check our social media and website for updates on the current situation: https://t.co/46KypBilUJ
This morning, EL AL brought back 1,000 Israelis from Peru. Watch the video below to hear what this trip meant to one of our brave pilots. https://t.co/w1cJCiIHoO

EL AL's special rescue flight operation to Lima, Peru was a success! Thank you to all of our crew members on all four flights for making this historic, 43-hour-long trip a success. Welcome home! 💙🇮🇱 https://t.co/GXV8Eot6wi

We apologize for any inconvenience. Currently, we are experiencing a high volume of calls. At the moment, we are focused on assisting passengers who are scheduled to travel in the next 72 hours. Please do not call unless you are scheduled to travel in the next 72 hours.

data.text: Due to the COVID-19 situation, EL AL will freeze your ticket. Once we return to regular operations, we will assist you in changing your destination or receiving a refund. Please visit our website for updates on our flight schedule: https://t.co/cu42LzWiMB.

EL AL has begun a special rescue flight operation to Lima, Peru following the announcement that Peru is closing its borders due to the COVID-19 crisis. 3 aircraft departed Ben-Gurion Airport last night. A 4th aircraft departed this morning. https://t.co/aHuMIyK6R4

data.text: Effective immediately (except for flights which are airborne), NON-Israeli customers will no longer be allowed to enter Israel. This applies to customers who already hold in their possession approval from the Israel Ministry of Health. Click here for more: https://t.co/cu42LzWiMB

EL AL is now allowing customers holding tickets for travel through 4/30/20 to postpone flights or freeze their tickets free of charge for departures starting 5/1/20 until 4/30/21. No change or reissue fees will apply except for a difference in fare. https://t.co/cu42LzWiMB
@ShintoPlasm Please visit our website for a list of our worldwide offices and phone numbers: https://t.co/S7BKNiQ0Xx
@Mpritzke Hi Marcie, please contact our customer service team at 1 (800) 223-6700.

@MarcPlotkin Hi Marc, we appreciate your patience during this challenging time. Rest assured, we have added personnel to our phone lines to help accommodate the demand. Thank you for your understanding.

@JWeissNYC Hi Jesse, thank you for your patience during this time. We have added personnel to our phone lines to accommodate the thousands of additional calls we are receiving. Please call our customer service team at 1 (800) 223-6700.
@ShintoPlasm Thank you for reaching out. Please contact a customer service representative for assistance on canceling your flight at: 1 (800) 223-6700.

@marczeffren Hi Marc, we appreciate your patience during this difficult time. Please know that we have added personnel to our phone lines to accommodate the thousands of additional calls we are receiving. Thank you for your understanding.

@jonzieve612 Hi Jon, we appreciate your patience during this difficult time. Rest assured, we have added personnel to our phone lines to accommodate the thousands of additional phone calls we are receiving. Thank you for your understanding.

@SteadyOptions_ Hi Kim, thank you for your patience during this time. As of now, that is our current policy. If you would like to speak with a customer service representative, please call 1 (800) 223-6700 or email customerrelations@elalusa.com.
@aryehsheinbein Hi Aryeh, since you purchased your tickets through AMEX Travel, they would be the ones to assist you in changing your flight.
